briefTitle: Performance and Safety of Vaginal Ring Applicator in Healthy Females (MK-8342A-063)
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Open Label, Randomized, Two-period Crossover Study on the Insertion of MK-8342A (NuvaRing®) Placebo With and Without the Use of NuvaRing Applicator in Healthy Female Subjects
conditions: Contraception: Optional Applicator for Insertion of Vaginal Ring
summary: The purpose of the study is to assess the performance and safe use of the vaginal ring applicator as an optional aid for insertion of a placebo vaginal ring into the vagina in healthy women

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Successful Ring Insertion
